https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yQtbCYPhBU4FGN1bf0CZf1sWlaW.jpg A film about the great 20th century sculptor whose work was inspired by the cubism of the 1920s, and her life story which contains all possible dramas for a creative person living in the previous century. Amazon of the Avant-garde
